name: generator-subgenext
description: Add custom sub generators to a Yeoman host generator
author: @sthzg

scripts.release:major: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag poc
scripts.release:minor: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag poc
scripts.release:patch: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag poc
